mainSequence.step: Me executes Remove Book From Catalog Activity.
Remove Book From Catalog Activity removes book from catalog by sending a request.
Remove Book From Catalog Request is sent to the source.
If source successfully removes the book, the result is returned to Remove Book From Catalog Result.
Remove Book From Catalog Result is processed.
If there is a BookNotFoundException, it is handled and a response is sent back to Me.
Otherwise, a successful response is sent back to Me.
